name: ProfileData
description: Represents a cpu profile or heap dump gathered from a node process

executorId.description: The ID if the Executor instance the process was running on

serviceId.description: The ID if the Service the process was running

serviceInstanceId.description: The ID if the Service instance the process was part of

type.description: The type of captured data: 'cpuprofile' or 'heapsnapshot'

targetId.description: The OS Process ID or cluster worker ID of the process.

startTime.description: Timestamp the cpu profile or heap dump was started

completed.description: Indicates if the profile generation is still in progress

fileName.description: The name of the file on the Executor

errored.description: If an error occurred, this contains the error message
